The door flew apart and crashed loudly into the wall in front of its
former location. A huge hand grabbed a petrified Guard 1, then brought
it back inside. The roars stopped for a few seconds, then Guard 1
screamed as a metallic crushing noise went off. Then, the roars came
again, yet a few words were comprehensible.

???: TOY!!!! WANT TOY!!!! RAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHH!!!!!

Somehow, the 3 remaining guards all had the same idea and eyed
Quickstrike even more intently...


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "CatMaster o" <CatMastero@y...> wrote:
> 'oh uh, this ain't they way I planned it,'  he tgought as his mind 
> raced to think up a counter.
> "I never said I killed that thing,  it's probaly
